lessons.title: Lesson 1: Foundational Concepts: Line, Ray, and Types of Angles

games.name: Angle Type Identifier
games.implementationDetails: Present angles (visual representations or degree measures). Ask student to label which type of angle (AC,RA, OA,straight or reflex).

games.name: Ray or segment builder
games.implementationDetails: Use tools create line or ray by drawing number from one side

games.name: What is the minimum number?
games.implementationDetails: Multiple choice based questions regarding minimum number of points require for specific object in geometry

lessons.title: Lesson 3: The Linear Pair Axiom and its Converse

games.name: Angle predictor
games.implementationDetails: Present one angel of the linear pair of number and students has to provide another angle and tell that the non common arm is line or not

games.name: Which is converse
games.implementationDetails: Present statement which one converse statement

games.name: Equal side identifier

games.name: Angle relation builder
games.implementationDetails: From given options pick equation that represents relation with vertically opposite angle
